message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $11000. What do you think?
